channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Trend Micro releases critical security fixes for Apex Central RCE - so patch now
item.description: A bug allowed hackers to inject DLLs without user interaction, gaining access to the underlying system.

item.title: Luminar lines up $22 million bidder for its lidar business
item.description: The bid comes from Quantum Computing Inc., which already lined up to buy Luminar's semiconductor division. Luminar founder Austin Russell has also expressed interest.

item.title: « On ne répond qu’à la moitié de la demande » : Micron justifie la fin de Crucial et enterre tout espoir avant 2028
item.description: Micron, qui a sacrifié sa célèbre marque Crucial sur l'autel de la rentabilité, tente de rassurer.

item.title: From Black Box to White Box: why AI agents shouldn’t be a mystery to enterprises
item.description: Why AI agents must be auditable, accountable, and governed to scale safely in the enterprise.

item.title: Gros bilan du CES 2026 dans Unlock Talk et une double Matinale Tech’ : notre programme Twitch de la semaine, c’est juste ici
item.description: Notre programme Twitch de la semaine du lundi 12 janvier 2026, c’est juste ici : nous vous donnons rendez-vous mercredi, jeudi et vendredi sur notre chaîne Frandroidlive, autant pour siroter votre café devant notre Matinale Tech' que pour profiter d'un Unlock Talk très porté sur le CES 2026.

item.title: C’est la grande braderie des PC portables gaming et bureautique : le TOP 8 des offres des soldes
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver 2026 ont démarré depuis près d'une semaine et on trouve de très belles offres, notamment du côté des PC portables. Que vous chercher une machine pour faire tourner vos jeux AAA ou d'un laptop ultrafin et performant pour bosser, vous devriez trouver votre bonheur dans cette sélection.

item.title: Cette petite île de 15 000 habitants touche le jackpot sans rien faire grâce à l’IA
item.description: Une petite île de 15 000 habitants qui encaisse des dizaines de millions de dollars grâce à l’IA… sans entraîner un seul modèle ni fabriquer une puce : bienvenue à Anguilla, territoire britannique des Caraïbes dont la plus grande richesse, aujourd’hui, tient en deux lettres seulement : .ai.

item.title: Meta appoints ex-Trump and Bush official as its new president and vice chairman
item.description: Meta has appointed Dina Powell McCormick, a banking executive and former Republican White House official, as its new president and vice-chairman. The company said McCormick will help guide its overall strategy and execution as a part of the management team.“Dina’s experience at the highest levels of global finance, combined with her deep relationships around the world, makes her uniquely suited to help Meta manage this next phase of growth as the company’s president and vice chairman,” said Meta Founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg.McCormick was a partner at Goldman Sachs and ran its Global Soverei...

item.title: On pensait le projet mort, Intel ressuscite le 14A (1,4 nm)
item.description: Oubliez tout ce qu'on disait l'année dernière. En 2025, Intel menaçait de tout arrêter si personne ne signait pour sa gravure 14A. Au CES 2026, l'ambiance a radicalement changé. Le CEO Lip-Bu Tan est formel : le projet fonce à toute allure. La raison de ce miracle ? Une puce qui tient enfin ses promesses.

item.title: Les abeilles pourraient nous aider à communiquer avec des intelligences extraterrestres
item.description: Trouver des signes de l’existence d’une vie extraterrestre, c’est déjà compliqué. Et une fois que ce sera fait, encore faudra-t-il disposer de moyens de communiquer avec une telle intelligence. Pour nous y préparer, des chercheurs suggèrent que nous commencions par... apprendre à parler avec les...

item.title: Mattel’s latest Barbie to celebrate diversity has autism
item.description: Mattel partnered with the nonprofit Autistic Self Advocacy Network to develop the doll. Mattel Inc. is introducing an autistic Barbie on Monday as the newest member of its line intended to celebrate diversity, joining a collection that already includes Barbies with Down syndrome, a blind Barbie, a Barbie and a Ken with vitiligo, and other models the toymaker added to make its fashion dolls more inclusive.Mattel said it developed the autistic doll over more than 18 months in partnership with the Autistic Self Advocacy Network, a nonprofit organization that advocates for the rights and better me...

item.title: The New ‘One Piece’ Trailer Introduces Some Baroque Baddies
item.description: Luffy and the Straw Hats have some deadly new troubles ahead when 'One Piece' season two arrives in March.

item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: What was the metaverse?
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg effectively declared its death last December. But the delusional fervor it inspired lives on. Late last year, Meta confirmed it would effectively be abandoning the metaverse, a nebulously defined project that spurred the company’s 2021 rebrand and has cost it over $70 billion since. At a strategy meeting at Mark Zuckerberg’s Hawaii compound, Reality Labs, the division responsible for the metaverse, was told to cut its budget by 30%, versus only 10% across the rest of the company. Reality Labs’ fate was arguably a long time coming: The division has never turned a profit, with cu...

item.title: Meta hires former Trump advisor Dina Powell McCormick as president and vice chair
item.description: Before joining Meta, Powell McCormick was working as deputy national security advisor to President Donald Trump.

item.description: Vous cherchez un bon casque pour accompagner votre Xbox Series X ou Series S ? Nous avons choisi pour vous les meilleurs casques sans fil et filaires pour les consoles de jeu Xbox.

item.title: AMD n’est pas fermé une version « bêta » du FSR 4 pour les anciens GPU
item.description: AMD n'est pas fermé à porter le FSR 4 sur ses anciennes générations de cartes graphiques. Peut-être que les joueurs les auront à l'usure ?

item.title: 'Not even 3 minutes in and I'm annoyed': Stranger Things documentary further frustrates fans over hit Netflix show's divisive finale
item.description: Stranger Things fans have reacted negatively to a new docufilm that seemingly sheds light on season 5's troubled development.

item.title: Ces lunettes AR taillées pour le streaming et le gaming nomade sont soldées à moitié prix
item.description: Les RayNeo Air 3s sont des lunettes à réalité augmentée capables de déployer un immense écran virtuel de 201 pouces en Full HD à 120 Hz. Cette paire est nettement plus intéressante maintenant qu'elle passe de 299 euros à 155 euros.

item.description: Google looks to offer agentic AI shopping experiences for consumers, but businesses also get useful tools.

item.description: Software and hardware on the Galaxy Z TriFold blend perfectly to create a second-to-none experience.

item.title: Adorama deal gets you a free Fujifilm X-Half when you buy an X-T5 - yes, really
item.description: Adorama's latest deal lets you bundle-in a free Fujifilm X-Half camera with the excellent Fujifilm X-T5 - one of the best gifts I've seen yet from the retailer.

item.title: Vibe coding is turning reporters into builders, and that’s a good thing for media
item.description: AI empowers creatives to experiment with storytelling. The challenge: turning that enthusiasm into a sustainable strategy. I teach AI to editorial and PR teams for a living, and if there’s one thing that excites and engages them more than any other, it’s vibe coding. The highly visual and interactive projects my students create with vibe-coding tools often turn me into the person taking notes....

item.title: Audible deal: Get three months of access for only $3
item.description:
One way to read more in the new year is to incorporate audiobooks as part of your reading habit. Audible is having a sale right now that makes that easier and cheaper to do: you can get three months of access for only $1 per month, or a total of $3. The promotion runs through January 21. An Audible subscription grants one audiobook per month to keep. This can be selected from a massive catalog of new releases and bestsellers. The collection here has just about everything.
However, it's easy to plow through a single book in a month. Users also get streaming access to thousands of curated tit...

item.title: Lego’s First ‘Pokémon’ Sets Are Here, and Sorry, They Cost How Much?
item.description: Get saving your Pokédollars: you've got a month and a half before the first-ever Lego Pokémon hit shelves, and you'll need a lot to catch 'em all.

item.title: Les 13 meilleures offres pour changer de TV 4K (QLED ou OLED) avant la fin de la 1er démarque des soldes
item.description: Avec les soldes d'hiver, les e-commerçants comptent bien écouler leurs TV 4K et vidéoprojecteurs par palettes ! Les meilleures offres du moment se trouvent dans cette sélection, et on y trouve aussi bien des modèles premium que abordables.

item.title: 5 ways to live a luckier life, starting tomorrow
item.description: Can you make your own luck? Absolutely. Where success is concerned—in whatever way you choose to define success—effort matters. So does skill. Experience. Perseverance. A willingness to do what others will not.

item.title: Apple's Mac mini M4 is back on sale for $499
item.description: The holiday season is fully in the rear view mirror and real life is here to stay. But that doesn't mean the time for gifts is over — especially ones for yourself. You can still take advantage of great January sales on some awesome tech products. Take the Apple Mac mini M4, which is down to $500 from $599. The 17 percent discount gives you 16GB of RAM and 256GB of SSD for only about $20 more than the computer's Black Friday sale. Its beefier models are also on sale: opting for 512GB of SSD will cost you $690, down from $799, while also upping your RAM to 24GB is available for $890, dropping fr...

item.title: Windows 11 : vous saurez enfin quel pilote vous installez via Windows Update
item.description: Windows 11 peut mettre à jour les pilotes de votre PC, mais la procédure crée la confusion sur un point.

item.title: The Weirdest Gadgets We Saw at CES 2026
item.description: As usual, the biggest consumer electronics show in the world did not disappoint in the wacky gadget department.

item.title: Who won big at the 2026 Golden Globe Awards
item.description: Nikki Glaser hosted the 83rd Golden Globes, which awarded Paul Thomas Anderson’s ‘One Battle After Another’ top honors in the comedy category. Paul Thomas Anderson’s ragtag revolutionary saga “One Battle After Another” took top honors at Sunday’s 83rd Golden Globes in the comedy category, while Chloé Zhao’s Shakespeare drama “Hamnet” pulled off an upset over “Sinners” to win best film, drama.“One Battle After Another” won best film, comedy, supporting female actor for Teyana Taylor and best director and best screenplay for Anderson. He became just the second filmmaker to sweep director, screen...

item.title: Discord stopped working in Egypt – and Proton VPN records massive usage spike
item.description: Discord appears to be the latest app to face restrictions in Egypt, despite authorities not confirming the ban yet. Proton recorded a 103% increase in sign-ups for its free VPN on Saturday, with usage continuing to rise.

item.title: Another ‘Stranger Things’ Star Could Be Joining the MCU
item.description: Plus, get a creepy look at Jack O'Connell's return for '28 Years Later: The Bone Temple'.

item.title: Harmattan AI raises $200M Series B led by Dassault Aviation, becomes defense unicorn
item.description: French defense tech company Harmattan AI is now valued at $1.4 billion after raising a $200 million Series B round led by Dassault Aviation, which is best known for making the Rafale fighter jet.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs SSD internes (M.2 NVMe) pour PC en 2026 ?
item.description: Les SSD M.2, compacts et ultra-rapides, transforment les performances de votre PC de bureau ou de votre PS5. Bienvenue sur notre sélection des meilleurs modèles de SSD internes pour tirer le maximum de vitesse et de réactivité de votre système.

item.title: Netflix won seven awards at the Golden Globes with Adolescence and KPop Demon Hunters
item.description: The 2026 Golden Globes took place on Sunday and it was another big night for streamers. Netflix took home seven awards, Apple and HBO Max each won three and Hulu got one. Netflix's hit show Adolescence received four awards alone, including best limited or anthology series. It also won for best actor (Stephen Graham), supporting actor (Owen Cooper) and supporting actress (Erin Doherty) in a miniseries or television film. KPop Demon Hunters — the sensation which became Netflix's most-watched title — won for best animated feature and best original song. "I just want to say this award goes to pe...

item.title: IKEA’s upgraded donut lamp is already my favorite smart home device of the year — here are 5 reasons why
item.description: I can't stop thinking about IKEA's new Varmblixt smart lamp, and these are the 5 reasons I seriously want to upgrade.

item.title: DJI and other drone companies get a partial reprieve in the US – but the ban on new models still stands
item.description: The Department of Commerce has decided not to make the US's worrying "DJI ban" even worse.

item.title: 2026 s’annonce comme une année décisive pour l’espace, et tout pourrait s’accélérer
item.description: De l'Inde aux États-Unis, en passant par la Chine et l'Europe, sans oublier la mission de Sophie Adenot à bord de l'ISS, l'année 2026 promet d'être riche en rebondissements dans le domaine de l'accès à l'espace et de la préparation à la conquête de la Lune. Découvrez les événements qui, selon...

item.title: DOJ subpoenas the Federal Reserve, threatening criminal indictment, says Jerome Powell
item.description: The renewed fight between Trump and the central bank could escalate borrowing costs for mortgages. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said Sunday the Department of Justice has served the central bank with subpoenas and threatened it with a criminal indictment over his testimony this summer about the Fed’s building renovations.The move represents an unprecedented escalation in President Donald Trump’s battle with the Fed, an independent agency he has repeatedly attacked for not cutting its key interest rate as sharply as he prefers. The renewed fight will likely rattle financial markets Monday...

item.title: Value City and American Signature Furniture are closing all stores in 2026. See the full list of doomed locations
item.description: The bankrupt retailer says it is ‘not offering refunds at the time,’ meaning some customers who had placed a deposit may now need to file a claim to get it back. After seeking Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in November 2025, Ohio-based retail chain American Signature Inc. (ASI) now says it will close all of its Value City Furniture and American Signature Furniture stores....

item.title: Les soldes, c’est le bon moment pour changer son smartphone : voici le TOP 12 des deals à retenir
item.description: Si vous attendiez les soldes pour changer de smartphones, vous avez bien fait ! Durant cette période, on trouve de belles offres du côté des Galaxy S de Samsung, des Pixel de Google et appareils Xiaomi, et même des iPhone d'Apple. Découvrez les meilleures offres : il y en a pour tous les budgets.

item.title: Get Apple's 25W MagSafe charger for only $30 right now
item.description:
One way you can reduce the number of cables you have to deal with on the regular is by investing in a few wireless chargers. Those with iPhones should consider Apple's own MagSafe charger not only because of its sleek and effective design, but also because it's on sale right now at Amazon. The Qi2.2-rated MagSafe charger is down to $30 for the one-meter version, or $40 for the two-meter version.
If you have an iPhone 16, iPhone 17 or iPhone Air, this cable can charge your device at 25W as long as it's connected to a 30W power adapter on the other end. While you'll need a more recent iPhone t...

item.title: Insta360 X5 : cette excellente action cam de 2025 perd une grosse partie de son prix pour les soldes
item.description: L'Insta360 X5 a intégré le catalogue de la marque spécialisée dans la vidéo en 2025. Cette récente caméra d'action bénéficie de pas mal d'améliorations par rapport au modèle précédent et est d'ores et déjà bien moins chère qu'à son lancement.

item.title: On pensait avoir touché le fond avec le Rabbit R1 et l’Humane Pin, mais l’industrie tech est pleine de ressources
item.description: Meizu vient de présenter le 22 Next. C'est un carré, ça a un écran de 4 pouces, ça vous fait des sourires, et ça promet de révolutionner votre vie.

item.description: iMac and Lego – the perfect combination? New concept set for Apple's original iMac G3 looks stunning.
